chapter_title: Severity

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Palo Alto Networks Vulnerabilities
text: Palo Alto Networks Cortex XDR Agent could allow a local authenticated attacker to gain elevated privileges on the system, caused by an uncontrolled search path element flaw. By using a specially-crafted file, an authenticated attacker could exploit this vulnerability to execute arbitrary programs with elevated privileges.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple Palo Alto Networks Vulnerabilities
text: Palo Alto Networks PAN-OS could allow a remote authenticated attacker to upload arbitrary files, caused by the improper validation of file extensions. By sending a specially-crafted HTTP request, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to upload a malicious configuration file, which could allow the attacker to execute arbitrary code with root privileges on the system.

chapter_title: Remediation
